attributes.action: Save Foxhills Farm and Riding Centre from shutting down for a housing estate!
attributes.background:
The Kingscliffe Property Company wants to shut down Foxhills Farm and Riding Centre which where I do voluntary work mucking out the horses and helping. 
The company wants to make high value houses on our land! 
Let's stop them from doing this!

rejection.details:
You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
